snippet.title: SAGA 3: Mission Impossible walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Adventure International)
snippet.description:
You need to stop a bomb from going off inside the world's first automatic nuclear reactor!

The third adventure in Scott Adams Graphic Adventure series, Mission Impossible (http://www.mobygames.com/game/scott-adams-graphic-adventure-3-secret-mission) was a graphics adventure game published by Adventure International in 1982 for the Apple ][. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Walkthrough - www.solutionarchive.com (Zeljko Juric)
